x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts.name: Copy a specific attachment

sys_update_version.name: x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_e4582467072739105295f19d7c1ed0b3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts"><x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Copy a specific attachment</name><number>SCRIPT0001064</number><script><![CDATA[function copyASpecificAttachment(sourceTable, sourceRecSysID, targetTable, targetRecSysID, fileName) {
	var sourceAttSysID;
	var newAttRecord;
	var attDataRecord;
	var newDocRecord;
	var attRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
	attRecord.addQuery('table_name', sourceTable);
	attRecord.addQuery('table_sys_id', sourceRecSysID);
	attRecord.addQuery('file_name', fileName);
	attRecord.query();
	while (attRecord.next()) {
		sourceAttSysID = attRecord.getValue('sys_id');
		newAttRecord = copyARecord(attRecord);
		newAttRecord.setValue('table_name', targetTable);
		newAttRecord.setValue('table_sys_id', targetRecSysID);
		newAttRecord.update();
		attDataRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment_doc');
		attDataRecord.addQuery('sys_attachment', sourceAttSysID);
		attDataRecord.query();
		while (attDataRecord.next()) {
			newDocRecord = copyARecord(attDataRecord);
			newDocRecord.setValue('sys_attachment', newAttRecord.getValue('sys_id'));
			newDocRecord.update();
		}
	}
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-11 07:51:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>e4582467072739105295f19d7c1ed0b3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Copy a specific attachment</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Technical Repo" source="x_207260_technic_0">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Technical Repo">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_e4582467072739105295f19d7c1ed0b3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-11 07:51:12</sys_updated_on></x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts></record_update>
